Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours

Class DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.AbstractGodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.BasicGodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours.BasicBuildBehaviour
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours.DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuildBehaviour, java.io.Serializable
public class DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour
extends BasicBuildBehaviour
This class implements Hephaestus's behaviour, that is building on the same space of the first build. It is only allowed if it not implies the build of a dome.

  • Method Details

    • handleInitBuild

      public void handleInitBuild​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException
      This method handles the build action according to the powers of Hephestus. So it allows the player to build a second time on the same place of the previous one.
      Specified by:
      handleInitBuild in interface BuildBehaviour
      Overrides:
      handleInitBuild in class BasicBuildBehaviour
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.
